snippet: The Ferrara Pan Candy Company, which was started in 1908 and taken over by Mr. Ferrara decades ago, also makes Red Hots and Boston Baked Beans.
abstract: Nello Ferrara, the candy company executive who brought the world Lemonheads and Atomic FireBalls, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: The Ferrara Pan Candy Company, which was started in 1908 and taken over by Mr. Ferrara decades ago, also makes Red Hots and Boston Baked Beans.

headline.seo: Nello Ferrara, Creator of Lemonheads Candy, Dies at 93
headline.main: Nello Ferrara, Creator of Lemonheads Candy, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Nello Ferrara, 93, Creator of Lemonheads Candy
